events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund for it as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message about receiving the wrong product.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah L. who handles all refund and return requests for the day.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 56789, and I have attached the photo showing the wrong item that arrived at my address.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I'm happy to hear the refund process has started. I appreciate your help!
We've processed your refund and closed the case on our end. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Please contact us if you have any further issues.
Closing the case now as the refund has been confirmed received by the customer with no further requests.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on the refund experience and overall support provided.
